content: Keanu Reeves has been a vocal supporter of several charities focused on mental health. In 2011, he donated $5 million to the development of a center for the study of neurodegenerative diseases at the University of Southern California. He has also supported the Child Mind Institute and Stand Up to Cancer. In 2019, he announced that he would be launching his own foundation, the Keanu Reeves Foundation, which would focus on funding charities that support mental health programs and research. Additionally, he has shared his own experiences with grief, depression, and anxiety, helping to reduce the stigma around mental health issues and encouraging others to seek help if they need it.
